name: Chiwawa
description: "Chiwawa describes itself as a ""fair launched, blockchain-based real time play-to-earn NFT game, where Chiwaians join in multiplayer battlefields with friends and other players, being able to earn money with just their skills!"" Aims to develop a game where players can participate and compete in tournaments using any character among the multiple unique NFTs, and earn money depending on their leaderboard position. Chiwa also aims to offer its players to build their own NFT field, and to earn profits by just renting it to other players."
